titleInfo.title: Flushed From The Bathroom Of Your Heart - Johnny Cash performance; Dirty Old Egg Sucking Dog - Johnny Cash performance

mods.accessCondition: This audio file is the property of the Country Music Hall of Fame® and Museum and may be protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. The file may not be downloaded, reproduced, or distributed without permission. End users must obtain all required permissions or consents from the owners of such rights. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this, contact audio@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite audio file information in email.
mods.abstract: Performance of Flushed From The Bathroom Of Your Heart, written by Jack H. Clement, produced by Don Law and Frank Jones, recorded on January 11, 1966 at Columbia Recording Studio in Nashville, TN, and performed by Johnny Cash (vocal and guitar), the Carter family (background vocals), Luther Perkins (guitar), Norman Blake (dobro), Marshall Grant (bass), and W.S. Holland (drums). Performance of Dirty Old Egg Sucking Dog, written by Jack H. Clement, produced by Don Law and Frank Jones, recorded on January 11, 1966 at Columbia Recording Studio in Nashville, TN, and performed by Johnny Cash (vocal and guitar), the Carter family (background vocals), Luther Perkins (guitar), Marshall Grant (bass), and W.S. Holland (drums).

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS v3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America.
